short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will allow you to create a custom new tab page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ever wanted to create a new tab without the boring websites that usually opens?? Now you can choose an image and text that will open when a new tab is created.
